UPS CyberPower PR1000RT2U

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


UPS CyberPower PR1000RT2U

Overview

I didn’t see any templates for Cyberpower UPS systems so I made a quick and simple one.

Hope this can help someone else!

Author

Adam Loghides

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.

This value is set to: - noTransfer(1), if UPS is in utility mode. - highLineVoltage(2), if UPS switch to battery mode by reason of input voltage over the high transfer vloltage. - brownout(3), if UPS switch to battery mode by reason of input voltage under the low transfer vloltage. - selfTest(4), if the UPS was commanded to do a self test.”</p>|SNMP agent|UPS-FailCause<p>Update: 30s</p>| |UPS-Name|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|UPS-Name<p>Update: 12h</p>| |UPS-TimeOnBattery|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|UPS-TimeOnBattery<p>Update: 30s</p>| |UPS-BatteryReplaceStatus|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|UPS-BatteryReplaceStatus<p>Update: 30s</p>|

There are no triggers in this template.
